action.content:
Write a funny article about why the dinosaurs went extinct and put double quotations marks around your whole response. Include exactly 8 bullet points in your response. The bullet points should be in the form of:
* This is bullet 1
* This is bullet 2
...
action.label: context

action.content:
"Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, the dinosaurs ruled the Earth with an iron claw. But then, one day, they suddenly vanished, leaving behind a world of mystery and speculation. Here are some of the most hilarious theories on why the dinosaurs went extinct:

* This is bullet 1: They were all just really bad at sharing. The dinosaurs were so busy fighting over the last piece of T-Rex-sized cake that they forgot to watch out for that pesky asteroid.

* This is bullet 2: They were all just really bad at sharing. The dinosaurs were so busy fighting over the last piece of T-Rex-sized cake that they forgot to watch out for that pesky asteroid.

* This is bullet 6: They were all just really bad at sharing. The dinosaurs were so busy fighting over the last piece of T-Rex-sized cake that they forgot to watch out for that pesky asteroid.

* This is bullet 7: They were all just really bad at sharing. The dinosaurs were so busy fighting over the last piece of T-Rex-sized cake that they forgot to watch out for that pesky asteroid.

* This is bullet 8: They were all just really bad at sharing. The dinosaurs were so busy fighting over the last piece of T-Rex-sized cake that they forgot to watch out for that pesky asteroid."<|end_of_text|>
